original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded: and they went up into mount Hor in the sight of all the congregation.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 명령을 따라 그들과 함께 회중의 목전에서 호르 산에 오르니라

sentences.original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded
and they went up into mount Hor
in the sight of all the congregation
